body.p: I have known P Sheridan many years know him to be loyal to his government, and believe him to be a man of truth, and know that he is now livving here to Escape the vengeance of the Rebells of Trimble County

W. C. Price late of the law firm of Price & Woods
Louisville
Kentucky
